text: Lindsay Nicole Korman (born April 17, 1978) is an American actress. She played Theresa Lopez-Fitzgerald Crane Winthrop on Passions, Cara Castillo on All My Children and Arianna Hernandez on Days of Our Lives. She was born in Palm Springs, California. Beyond soap operas, Hartley has acted in numerous Lifetime and Hallmark movies, written and directed several films, and continues to work in television and film. She was married to actor Justin Hartley from 2004 to 2012, and they have one daughter. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from California Category:People from Palm Springs, California
title: Lindsay Hartley
